pickleRec¶

outputting.pickleRec(data, handle, fileNameGen)[source]¶

Writes the data to a pickle file

Parameters:
  • data (object) – Data to be written to the file
  • handle (string) – The name of the file
  • fileNameGen (function) – Creates a new file with the name <handle> and the extension <extension>. It takes two string parameters: (handle, extension) and returns one fileName string

Previous topic

pickleLog
